p.strong:
IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: Following the Governor’s announcement of the state-wide extension, Salem Academy will be closed until May 4.
For updates about our COVID-19 efforts, please click here.
For the DESE COVID-19 website, please click here.

div.p: Salem Academy Charter School is a free, charter public school serving the diverse student population of Salem with a college preparatory program, Grades 6-12
Welcome to Salem Academy Charter School!

Salem Academy Charter School is a small, public charter school serving the diverse student population of Salem and the surrounding communities with grades six through twelve. Through a unique integration of college preparatory classes with service to the community, Salem Academy’s mission is to graduate informed, articulate, and proactive individuals of strong character. Today, Salem Academy has over 400 students in grades six through twelve.
